Aqua_Bolt.help: You strike your foe with a rapid blast of freezing cold water, causing cold and smashing damage. The target's defenses are also reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Hydro_Blast.help: You focus your energy and unleash an intense blast of chilling water at your foe, causing cold and smashing damage. Affected foes will also have their movement speed reduced. There is also a chance that the target will be knocked down.
Hydro_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Hydro_Blast.targetHelp: Your movement speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Water_Burst.help: You cause water to violently explode from beneath the feet of a single target. The target and all nearby foes are blasted with freezing cold water and suffer cold and smashing damage. Additionally, all affected targets will have their movement speeds reduced and may be knocked down.
Water_Burst.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG(Cold/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Water_Burst.targetHelp: Your movement speeds have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Steam_Spray.help: You spray scalding hot steam in a cone in front of you, badly burning foes caught within the spray. Affected foes suffer an initial burst of fire damage, as well as fire damage over time, and experience reduced defenses for a short time.
Steam_Spray.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Extreme DMG (Fire), Minor DoT (Fire), -DEF (Foe, All)
Steam_Spray.targetHelp: You are suffering fire damage over time and your defenses have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Geyser.help: You cause a powerful geyser of scalding hot water to erupt from within the earth, burning your foes and tossing them into the air. Affected targets suffer fire damage and are knocked into the air, while also suffering smashing damage and reduced movement speeds upon falling back to the ground. There is a chance that the fall could also leave affected targets stunned.
Geyser.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Fire/Smashing), -Speed (Foe, All), Knockup (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Geyser.targetHelp: Your movement speed has been reduced and you may be stunned.

Transfusion.help: You drain an enemy of some endurance and lower their regeneration. The energy drained is transferred to you and your allies, healing them.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} siphons off your endurance and lowers your regeneration.
You lose {Damage} points of endurance due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Siphon_Power.help: You manipulate life energy to drain power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. This drained power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies.
Siphon_Power.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.attackerHit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} siphons off your power, reducing your damage potential.

Fulcrum_Shift.help: You drain the power of a targeted foe and all foes near the target, transferring this drained power to yourself and all nearby allies. Affected foes suffer reduced damage potential, while affected allies gain improved damage potential. The amount of the damage potential bonus increases in proportion to the number of targets affected by the power drain.
Fulcrum_Shift.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName}.
